nars.util.graph

Class TermLinkGraph2

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapht.graph.AbstractGraph<V,E>
      • org.jgrapht.graph.AbstractBaseGraph<V,E>
        • org.jgrapht.graph.DirectedPseudograph<Termed,Termed>
          • nars.util.graph.TermLinkGraph2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, org.jgrapht.DirectedGraph<Termed,Termed>, org.jgrapht.Graph<Termed,Termed>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TermLinkGraph2.TermLinkTemplateGraph

    public class TermLinkGraph2
extends org.jgrapht.graph.DirectedPseudograph<Termed,Termed>
    Generates a graph of a set of Concept's TermLinks. Each TermLink is an edge, and the set of unique Concepts and Terms linked are the vertices.
    See Also:
